data.name: KAMiBAKO - Mythology of Cube -
data.detailed_description:
About the story

■ Mythical era


The world was created by the goddess after the defeat of the devil.
As a result of the war, the goddess lives in heaven, humans live on the ground, and the devil has fled to the abyss.

■ People's era


5 countries rose to power in the land, and although there were differences in politics, culture, race, and ethnicity; they coexisted and prospered.

However, the world has changed completely.

In the wake of the ""Great Division"", the land was broken and divided into 5 continents.

The ""fragmented"" land rapidly expanded across the world.
""Fragmentation"" is a phenomenon peculiar to this world, in which a large cubic hole opens in the land.

These hole are connected to the ""Abyss"" and are known to be connected to the appearance of monsters.

These effects of ""fragmentation"" have made it difficult to travel between continents.

The divided countries face their own problems as well.
""Increases in attacks from monsters"", ""travel and trade problems"", ""food shortages"", ""lack of resources"", ""civil war"", ""conspiracies"", ""inner conflict""
Although the world is in chaos and each country has faces strife, they do their best to survive.

Now that the unity of the five countries has disappeared due to ""fragmentation"", it is difficult to clarify and resolve the cause. The ""fragmentation""quickly spread to the world.

To address this issue, the goddess decided to increase the selection of ""restorers"" from the ground.
She decided to send restorers to each region to stop the progress of ""fragmentation"".
The goal of the game is to repair the fragmented lands and restore the world.

First, connect puzzles to repair the fragmented lands.

Get crops and materials when you restore land.
Enrich the land by using these acquired materials.

Monsters will also appear to damage and bring havoc to the land. Cooperate with your friends to defeat the monsters.
"In battle, the restorer can save mana from the land to the cube (god box).

Crush the cube, retrieve the mana, and give it to your friends.

Defeat opponents with superior attributes.
The restorer can summon spirits for a certain period of time by accumulating cubes . Change the attributes of the land and turn the battle to your advantage.



About the game



The goal of the game is to repair the fragmented lands and restore the world.

First, connect puzzles to repair the fragmented lands.

Get crops and materials when you restore land.
Enrich the land by using these acquired materials.

Monsters will also appear to damage and bring havoc to the land. Cooperate with your friends to defeat the monsters.




About the battle



In battle, the restorer can save mana from the land to the cube (god box).

Crush the cube, retrieve the mana, and give it to your friends.

Defeat opponents with superior attributes.
The restorer can summon spirits for a certain period of time by accumulating cubes . Change the attributes of the land and turn the battle to your advantage.

data.short_description: "Crafting" x "Puzzles" x "Battle" x "RPG" !? A game system that evokes a unique new game genre that will give you a brand new experience. Become the "Restorer" who aims to save the world by finding solutions to the "great division" and "fragmentation", the world's...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-3330
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: サウンドカード: DirectX Compatible
